races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are found in every corner of the realm.
races.lore: Humans are the most numerous of the civilized races, known for their ambition and diversity. Their relatively short lifespans drive them to achieve greatness in whatever time they have.
races.traitDescription: Gain one additional skill point each level.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves possess an innate connection to magic and nature.
races.lore: The elves are an ancient people who witnessed the dawn of civilization. Their long lives grant them patience and perspective, though some say it also breeds a certain detachment from the concerns of shorter-lived races.
races.traitDescription: Bonus to perception checks and cannot be surprised.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout and hardy, dwarves are master craftsmen who dwell in mountain strongholds.
races.lore: Dwarves are renowned throughout the realm for their craftsmanship, their love of ale, and their stubbornness. Their underground kingdoms are marvels of engineering, carved over generations.
races.traitDescription: Resistance to poison and advantage on saves against toxins.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small in stature but big in heart, halflings are known for their luck and quick wits.
races.lore: Halflings prefer the simple pleasures: good food, warm hearths, and peaceful communities. Yet when adventure calls, their natural luck and nimbleness serve them surprisingly well.
races.traitDescription: Once per encounter, reroll a natural 1 on any check.
